title: Eight Upanishads, with the Commentary of Sankaracarya, Vol. I
description: Part 1 of a two-volume set. Volume One covers the Isa, Kena, Katha, and Taittiriya Upanishads. Each verse has the Devanagri Sanskrit, with English translation and commentary, with further commentary by Sankaracarya. Also included is an Index to texts in Devanagri Sanskrit.
author: Adi Shankaracharya
